data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_b40e578f13465b3ae99d0a9baac7ecc9.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Roger can freely switch between human and wolf forms.

In human form, Roger's Basic Attack and skills deal additional damage equal to 4% of the target's current HP.

In wolf form, Roger's Basic Attack and skills deal additional damage equal to 4% of the target's lost HP.

This effect can only deal up to 60 additional damage against Creeps.

Roger fires two quick shots in the target direction, dealing 250<font color="fba51f"> (+125% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> in total to the enemy hit. The first shot is a hunter net that slows the enemy by 80% for 1.5s, while the second is a bullet that reduces the enemy's Physical Defense by 10 for 5s.
Roger gains 20% Movement Speed and 20% Attack Speed for 2.5s.

Roger lunges in the target direction and turns into wolf form, dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 90% for 0.8s.

<font color="a6aafb">Passive</font>: In wolf form, Roger gains 20 Physical & Magic Defense and 25 Movement Speed.

Roger can freely switch between human and wolf forms.

In human form, Roger's Basic Attack and skills deal additional damage equal to 4% of the target's current HP.

In wolf form, Roger's Basic Attack and skills deal additional damage equal to 4% of the target's lost HP.

This effect can only deal up to 60 additional damage against Creeps.

Roger lunges at the target enemy, becoming untargetable while dealing 250<font color="fba51f"> (+125% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to up to 3 enemies in the area.

Getting a kill or assist will reduce the cooldown of this skill by 80%.
Roger lets out a howl, increasing his Attack Speed by 1.15 times for 5s. Within this duration, he gains 50% Movement Speed if an enemy hero below 40% HP is within his vision.
Roger rolls in the target direction and reverts back to human form, gaining a 200<font color="fba51f"> (+200% Extra Physical Attack)</font> shield for 1.5s.

data.name: Roger

__data.skilldesc:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num1> [C5True Damage] to the target Creep or Minion.####[C2Passive]: Increases Creep rewards by <%Num2> and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by <%Num3>. Also grants <%Num5> additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first <Num4> min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first <Num6> min.####[C2Blessing:] Accumulate <Num8> Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldescemblem:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.

recommendmasterplan.description: Jungle: Extreme Movement Speed and a merciless finisher.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+14 Adaptive Penetration
+10 Adaptive Attack
+3% Movement Speed

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <Num1> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Penetration[-].########[8098ab]Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.[-]
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>

emblemskill.skilldesc: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Equipment can be purchased at <%Num1> of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
After killing an enemy hero, instantly recover 15% of Lost HP and gain 20% Movement Speed.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 3s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: After killing an enemy hero, instantly recover <%Num1> of Lost HP and gain <%Num2> Movement Speed.########[8098ab]Duration: <Num3>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
After killing an enemy hero, instantly recover 15% of Lost HP and gain 20% Movement Speed.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 3s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
equiplist.equipskill2: Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+18 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Typhoon: Every 5-2s (reduced by 0.2s for each Basic Attack), the next Basic Attack will hit up to 3 enemy units for 150-362 Magic Damage. (This attack can Crit and the damage increases to 200% against Minions.)
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Typhoon: Every 5-2s (reduced by 0.2s for each Basic Attack), the next Basic Attack will hit up to 3 enemy units for 150-362 Magic Damage. (This attack can Crit and the damage increases to 200% against Minions.)
equiplist.equiptips:
+35% Extra Attack Speed
+20% Crit Chance
+20 Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals <font color="fba51f"> (+0.6 Total Physical Attack)</font> extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskill2: Chase Fate: Triggering Divine Justice grants 10% extra Movement Speed.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals <font color="fba51f"> (+0.6 Total Physical Attack)</font> extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).
Chase Fate: Triggering Divine Justice grants 10% extra Movement Speed.
equiplist.equiptips:
+60 Extra Physical Attack
+250 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+8% Hybrid Lifesteal
+5% Movement Speed
+5 Mana Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+600 Extra Max HP
+23 Extra Physical Defense
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

recommendmasterplan.name: Ybig
recommendmasterplan.title: Influencer

data.story: A werewolf wandering in the dark forest longing for revenge.

assist.desc: Roger works best with heroes with high AOE damage that can nuke the enemy team to low HP for him to finish off, such as Pharsa and Vexana.

strong.desc: Roger counters squishy heroes that lack mobility such as Hanabi and Odette because they cannot easily escape from him.

weak.desc: Roger is countered by heroes that can restrict his mobility and prevent him from jumping in and out using his two forms, like Minsitthar and Khufra.
